page.title: 07Watercress
page.content: Running through the village is a stream. Watercress is cultivated in this stream and has been for at least a couple of centuries. it was sold in London street markets and it has a place in many local markets today. It is sold in the village from a hut at 50p for large bunch. Local residents say that there is a bit of local folk lore about the watercress beds. Any young couple gazing out across the growing cress will soon be announcing the birth of a baby. Several older residents testify that this has proved to be the case in their own experience.
